title: How to Make Bacon Cake

steps.headline: Cut the bacon into smaller pieces.
Beat together the flour, eggs, baking powder and salt and pepper to taste.
Gradually pour in the oil and gently heated milk.
Add the shredded cheese and chopped bacon.
Pour the batter into the lined or silicon cake pan.
steps.description: Do not grease! The bacon will contribute enough grease.

steps.headline: Place in the preheated oven.
steps.description: Bake for 35 to 45 minutes. Remove from the oven and leave to cool.

steps.headline: Remove from the pan when completely cooled.
Serve.
steps.description: Cut slices and serve with a picnic meal, barbecue or eat as a snack food.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C) degrees.  Cut the bacon into smaller pieces.  Beat together the flour, eggs, baking powder and salt and pepper to taste.  Gradually pour in the oil and gently heated milk.  Add the shredded cheese and chopped bacon. Mix through thoroughly. Pour the batter into the lined or silicon cake pan. Do not grease! The bacon will contribute enough grease. Place in the preheated oven. Bake for 35 to 45 minutes. Remove from the oven and leave to cool. Remove from the pan when completely cooled.  Serve. Cut slices and serve with a picnic meal, barbecue or eat as a snack food.
